description.ko: 빛과 물이 테크 누아르의 꿈결 같은 풍경으로 합쳐지는 미래 도시 중심부의 낭만적인 비전입니다.
description.en: A romanticized vision of a futuristic urban core where light and water merge into a tech-noir dreamscape.

prompt: A cinematic low-angle shot of a rain-drenched cyberpunk alleyway in NEON-V. Towering metallic skyscrapers are adorned with massive 3D holograms of bioluminescent koi fish in #FF00FF magenta and #00FFFF cyan. Heavy monsoon rain creates vibrant, distorted reflections on the #1A0033 indigo wet asphalt. Flying vehicles leave sharp #FF6B35 orange light trails across the foggy urban canyon. Volumetric fog, ray-traced reflections, and hyper-detailed tech-noir textures. 8k resolution, moody and romantic futuristic atmosphere.
